title: This new HUD.
body: Please bring in an option to return to the old HUD. Updates are always good but this is way too far over the top. I've played for years and years and this is the first update that has made me not want to play this game anymore. If you're going to be a smart cunt and comment in this go fuck yourself.

replies.body: Well if you dont wanna play anymore.....dont?

> [{quoted}](name=Too much rage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KkBZxoaN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-23T07:57:43.703+0000)
>
> Well if you dont wanna play anymore.....dont?

He does want to play. Just give him the option of customising the design how he likes. Then we can get back to what actually matters - playing the game! Games are there for entertainment and gamplay in my view, not a graphics design contest.

"I've played for years and years and this is the first update that** has made me not want to play this game anymore**"

sit yo ass down.
